title: Commercial Locksmith
text: Commercial Locksmith USA, 22 October 2015 -- We understand how modern cars can be tough to deal with due to their advanced security systems. Such advanced systems do not respond effectively to old locksmith methods and using outdated methods can damage your car.Sacramento, CA, 22-OCTOBER-2015 - 24 Locksmith is the most trusted emergency locksmith company in Sacramento, providing the fastest 24-hour emergency lockout assistance and automobile locksmith work in the city. Are you locked out of your house late at night? Can’t get into your car and don’t want to waste time and money on towing? 24 Locksmith will come to you and solve your problem on the spot. We can solve all forms of car emergencies in Sacramento and the greater Sacramento region. We also provide a wide range of security services for your car during non – emergency situations. Our team of locksmiths is available 24/7 and uniquely equipped to respond to the needs of the modern car owner. We understand how modern cars can be tough to deal with due to their advanced security systems. Such advanced systems do not respond effectively to old locksmith methods and using outdated methods can damage your car. Our locksmiths are well trained to handle such situations and will use their cutting-edge technology to service your car without causing any damage. We also make transponder chip keys, VATS keys, car key remotes, classic double cut metal brass keys and keyless entry systems. Our locksmith services are 100% mobile. This allows us to get to your location as quickly as possible, anytime and anywhere you are in Sacramento and its environs. We are available 24/7 and ready to help. Pick up your phone, call one of our locksmiths and let us do the thinking. Rest assured that your lockout emergency will be resolved within the shortest time possible. We do not tolerate second chances! Allow us to make the right impression from your first visit. What are you waiting for? We employ a team of licensed professional locksmiths, highly skilled experts who are experienced in working fast. We are dedicated to reaching you wherever you are and getting you where you need to be as quickly as possible, and to that end our dispatchers are ready by the phone 24/7. Within 15 seconds of your call, they will answer and send the nearest technician straight to you. And we guarantee fair prices so everyone can afford our services. Jay Cohen, owner and founder of 24 Locksmith, began his locksmith career in Boston, at a local locksmith shop. It became clear to him that there was high demand for a fast-response, fully mobile emergency locksmith company that was open round the clock. He combined his skills and vision to form 24 Locksmith in 2007. We took off from there and soon developed into the fully mobile service that we are now. 24 Locksmith owes its success to the loyalty of its clients. We are now a national company with branches in cities large and small across the country. Visit our website http://24locksmithsacramento.com to find out more details. However, we never compromise our principals of efficiency, quality workmanship and outstanding customer service. We always strive to improve and better serve our valued customers. Members of the press and those who have further questions about the contents of this press release are invited to contact Jay Cohen at the location described below. Contact Person Name: Jay Cohen Company Name: 24 sacramento locksmith Address: Sacramento, CA 95811 United States Contact Telephone Number:(916) 229-6040
